A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie might be the most personal and artistic of all the Star Wars franchise. Mixing in Rian Johnson's signature directorial style with the bombastic action the franchise is known for. Johnson manages to capture what made the original trilogy work while also recontextualizing it for a new generation. Rather than be slavishly stuck in what fans want he decides to challenge the audience with twists and turns that could not be guessed. Rather than a nostalgic movie it is one that goes its own direction. A franchise high m.
